videos.headline: Fort Wayne turns the steal into a easy dunk

videos.description: 1H (4:08) ND V.J. Beachem made Three Point Jumper.
videos.headline: Notre Dame keeps the ball alive and hits the open 3 to extend the lead

videos.description: Notre Dame used the 3 ball to gain a nice lead at half
videos.headline: Notre Dame used the 3 ball to gain a nice lead at half

videos.description: Matt Farrell's 3-pointer fails to connect but John Mooney is there for the sweet putback dunk and Notre Dame ends the half in style.
videos.headline: Mooney's putback dunk ends first half
M. Evans made Layup and gets fouled

videos.description: 2H (2:51) IPFW Charles Ruise Jr. made Jumper.
videos.headline: C. Ruise Jr. made the runner to cut the lead to single digits

videos.description: Steve Vasturia scores 21 points as Notre Dame improves to 9-0 with an 87-72 victory over Fort Wayne.

videos.headline: Notre Dame stays perfect with win over Fort Wayne
